CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 27, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "[Illegible]...American Summer Outing - One of the high... of the summer season was the interracial picnic sponsored... Physics, Education, University of Pittsburgh. An all-day outing, the picnic was attended by a large number of young men and women... in the fight for complete interracial and intercultural harmony in our city.  All sorts of games and competitive events took place, with a spirit of real democracy prevailing.  Cooperating in the event were members of the Physical Education Department of the Centre Avenue YMCA, directed by Pomeroyal C. Fountain, a graduate student at Pitt. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Men and women wearing bathing suits, gathered around swimming pool at North Park for interracial picnic sponsored by the University of Pittsburgh Physical Education Department
